Bemob

I have post campaign url in test but it could not complete

It sounds like there might be an issue with the test URL or the conversion process. Make sure that your Postback URL is correctly filled in with the right endpoint and parameters. Double-check that the callback parameter is set properly in BeMob. If everything seems correct, try testing again by completing the conversion event on the landing page. If you're still facing issues, you can refer to this [NewsBreak Postback on BeMob guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/30938725150733-How-to-setup-a-Newsbreak-Postback-on-BeMob) for detailed instructions.

Payment method
Credit card **** **** **** 5015
To solve the issue and resume your ads, you can do one of the following:
Use a different card
Work with your bank to solve the issue on your current card. Once fixed, please  click here to try to authorize your card again.

It seems like you're having an issue with your payment method. If your current credit card is not working, you can try using a different card. Alternatively, you can contact your bank to resolve any issues with the current card. Once the issue is fixed, you can attempt to authorize your card again by following the provided instructions. If you need further assistance or have any questions, feel free to reach out!
I have tried 3 cards
all are not working

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with multiple cards. It might be best to contact your bank to ensure there are no issues on their end. If the problem persists, you can also try adding ad credits to your account as a temporary solution. If you need further assistance, please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for more help.

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with your payment methods. Since you've tried multiple cards and none are working, I recommend contacting your bank to ensure there are no issues on their end. Additionally, you can try adding ad credits to your account as a temporary solution. If the problem persists, please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
do you accept crypto ?

Currently, we do not accept cryptocurrency as a payment method. We recommend using a credit card or adding ad credits to your account for payments. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
how to add credits ?

To add ad credits to your account, follow these steps:
1. Access the Billing Section in your NewsBreak Ad Manager.
2. Under Ad Credits, click on â€˜Add ad credits.â€™
3. Select the amount of ad credits you would like to purchase.
4. Provide your credit card information and complete the payment.
For more detailed instructions, you can check out this [guide on how to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
Please go to our Help Center to submit a ticket to apply for the "Add Ad Credits" feature first. Only account admin can add ad credits.

It looks like you need to apply for the "Add Ad Credits" feature first. To do this, please visit our Help Center and submit a ticket requesting access to this feature. Remember, only account admins can add ad credits. If you need further assistance or have any questions, feel free to reach out!

Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
When will we able to add ad creidt ?

Ad credits can be added by the account admin. If you're having trouble or need further assistance, you can submit a ticket through the Help Center for the 'Add Ad Credits' feature. Here's a helpful article on how to redeem ad credits: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). Let me know if you have any other questions!
Do you have agent support ?

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If you need further assistance, you can always reach out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
I have applied to add ad credit
but still waiting for it
Great! Once you've submitted your request to add ad credits, our team will review it. If you have any specific questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.

If you've applied to add ad credits and are still waiting, it might take some time for the process to complete. If you believe there's an issue or need further assistance, please contact our Ad Support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They'll be happy to help resolve any issues.
